      • getSum

        public Velocity getSum(Vector v)
                throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
        Gets the sum of this velocity and a given vector.
        Overrides:
        getSum in class Vector
        Parameters:
        v - The given vector.
        Returns:
        A velocity whose components are the sums of the respective components of this velocity and the given vector. | result == new Velocity(getXComponent() + v.getXComponent(), getYComponent() + v.getYComponent())
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - One of the components of the resulting velocity is not a number. | Double.isNaN(result.getXComponent) || Double.isNaN(result.getYComponent)

        duration - The given duration.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The given duration is strictly negative. | duration < 0
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - Any of the resulting components is not a valid component. | (!canHaveAsComponent(getXComponent()) || ! canHaveAsComponent(getYComponent()))

        @Raw
public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)

        Overrides:
        equals in class Vector
        Parameters:
        o - The given object.
        Returns:
